changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_TIMESERIES', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_TIMESERIES', 'PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES', 'PK_TIMESERIES';
